name: Verify Interactive - JavaScript
description: Comprehensive JavaScript evaluation covering ES6+, React, Node.js, and DOM manipulation with live coding exercises

name: Verify Interactive - Python
description: Python coding assessment testing algorithms, data structures (OOP), and frameworks (Django/Flask) with real-world problems

name: Full-Stack Developer Assessment
description: Combined evaluation of JavaScript (React), Python (FastAPI), database design, and system architecture

name: Cognitive Ability Test Pro
description: Advanced problem-solving assessment covering numerical reasoning, logical puzzles, and pattern recognition for tech roles

name: Technical Problem Solving
description: Debugging complex JavaScript/Python codebases and optimizing system architecture

name: Developer Personality Profile
description: Evaluates collaboration style, communication preferences, and problem-solving approaches in technical teams
